articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another exciting weekend of competitive cannabis took place this past weekend in Clio, Michigan! In case you missed the High Times Medical Cannabis Cup in the Mitten State, here are the champion strains and products that blew away the judges. (Also, did you score a strain t-shirt from Leafly's booth at the Cup? Remember to send us a picture on Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter!)
 
 Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Paris OG from Oasis Medical Seeds
2nd Place: Alien Dawg F2 from Herbal Solutions
3rd Place: Grape OX from Herban Legendz, LLC
 
 Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Catfish from Arborside Compassion
2nd Place: Ghost Train Haze #1 from Organibliss
3rd Place: MelonGum from We Grow Education and Collective Centers
 
 Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: GG (f.k.a Gorilla Glue) from Herbal Solutions
2nd Place: Death Star from Pure West Compassion Club
3rd Place: Veganic Candyland from Kushman Veganics for Buds & Roses
 
Best Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Raskal's Lemon from Mr. B's Extracts
2nd Place: Kosher Kush Dewaxed from 710 Savant
3rd Place: Candy Jack Shatter from Oasis Medical / Vader Extracts / Dab Vader
 
Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Jedi Kush Ice Wax from NLG
2nd Place: HeadCandy Kush Hash from Compassion
3rd Place: Northern Hash Plant Hash from New World Seeds Resource Center
 
Best High CBD Cannabis Products
Flowers: Cannatonic from Detroit Nutrient Company / IDK Farms
Concentrates: Concentrated Hemp Oil "CBD" from CANNA Vest / Care of Michigan Hemp Company
Edibles: Flower of Life Extract CBD Pills w/ Vernon Phillips from MTG
photo credit (resized): w4nd3rl0st (InspiredinDesMoines) via photopin cc
articles.title: The 2014 Michigan Medical Cannabis Cup Winners

description: Melon Gum was born with the crossing of Lavender and Bubble Gum, who pass on a combination of fruity flavors and vibrant bud coloration. Sweet notes of melon, strawberry, and lemon come together to create an intricate flavor profile that lends this strain its name. Melon Gum produces heavy yields following its 50 to 57 day flowering time indoors, and outdoor cultivators should plan to harvest during the September and October transition.
descriptionPlain: Melon Gum was born with the crossing of Lavender and Bubble Gum, who pass on a combination of fruity flavors and vibrant bud coloration. Sweet notes of melon, strawberry, and lemon come together to create an intricate flavor profile that lends this strain its name. Melon Gum produces heavy yields following its 50 to 57 day flowering time indoors, and outdoor cultivators should plan to harvest during the September and October transition.

highlightedReviews.text:
Got this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA. See pictures and detailed reviews on my blog - AgingEnt.com --Brand: Honu
Strain: Melon Gum
Sativa-dominant Hybrid--
Potency Analysis: TTL 15.85% THC .14% CBD 0% THCA 17.91%
--Packaging: 4.75" x 3.25" bright pink/purple plastic and mylar rip-top, zip-top bag --
Cost: $10/gram--
This is some really pretty marijuana.  The buds are all fluffy little balls.  This value priced, $10 gram came up at 1.1grams
--
This Melon Gum has a sharp, very sweet candy-like smell.  It's really clean and delicious.
--
The nuggets themselves have this gorgeous neon/crystal-white coloring and there are these bright orange hairs throughout every single nug and in between each and every nug structure.
--
The smoke on this is as candy-sweet as it smells.  There's definitely an underlying sharp spiciness, like biting into a pink peppercorn while eating.  It just spreads throughout the smoke and provides a nice exhale flavor.  There's no real bite to it though, it's a unique flavor profile.
--
This is definitely Sativa-dominant, fast-thought, advanced cerebral activity kind of pot, with an underlying body-high that is relaxing and calm.  I smoked this with a few different people, and some might note this is on the edge of being too Sativa, and could slide into an uncomfortable place. --

The moral of the story is - Puff these puffy poofs of pot, and if paranoia persists in your perception, please proceed with perspicacity.

Wow what a pleasant suprise is this weed!! Great smooth REAL melon flavour, as a flower and when smoked. Ideal for couchsurfing. Outstanding mix of every aspect good weed needs in my opinion; calming, relaxing, moodbooster, with a nice indica punch for the bodyrelaxation. I have to admit I'm not even a bit of a Bubblegum-fan, most of the time it has a bit of a sharp and dry, unpleasant smoke is my experience, and trust me I tried a few . This is the twist Bubbles needed, makes it way smoother and with a much nicer indica twist!!

name: Melon Gum
